Oct   Arlington Texas USA Chicago Bears wide receiver Dante Pettis  in action during the game between the Dallas Cowboys and the Chicago Bears at ATT Stadium PERIOD Mandatory Credit Jerome MironUSA TODAY Sports

Bears wide receiver Dante Pettis was placed on injured reserve Friday PERIOD

Pettis was vying for the fifth wide receiver job in Chicago and had been under consideration for the primary punt return role PERIOD He started seven games and played in all  with the team in  PERIOD

Pettis has played in  career games and spent his first four seasons in the NFL mostly with the New York Giants outside of five games with the San Francisco 49ers in that time PERIOD

The Bears also waived wide receiver Joe Reed with an injury designation PERIOD Reed played in  games for the Los Angeles Chargers in  PERIOD

Cincinnati Bengals defensive end Tarell Basham was waived PERIOD

The seventhyear pro signed with the Bengals in April but he missed most of training camp with a leg injury PERIOD

Sixthyear safety Dane Cruikshank was released by the New York Jets PERIOD

Cruikshank was a fifthround draft pick in  and appeared in  career games including four starts for the Titans and Bears PERIOD

Cruikshank signed with the Jets on July  PERIOD

The Houston Texans released veteran cornerback Darius Phillips waived offensive tackle Jacky Chen and signed punter Ty Zentner PERIOD

Houstons regular punter Cameron Johnston tweaked his calf muscle multiple reports said so the team needed to pick up a replacement for the preseason finale against the New Orleans Saints PERIOD Zentner an undrafted free agent out of Kansas State was waived by Philadelphia this month PERIOD

Phillips  spent last year with the Denver Broncos after his first four NFL seasons with the Bengals PERIOD He has five career interceptions and  tackles in  games  starts PERIOD
